title: Investigators: Divorce special
creator_credit: Catherine Shirley and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: This special edition of “The Investigators” looks at how two people can disentangle their lives when their marriage grinds to a halt. It is a consumer guide on how to ease the pain and loss of separation and includes useful hints on how to make a divorce less painful, if not more amicable.
